cast.overview: When the Flash finds himself dropped into the middle of World War II, he joins forces with Wonder Woman and her top-secret team known as the Justice Society of America.
cast.title: Justice Society: World War II

details.biography: Chris Diamantopoulos (born May 9, 1975) is a Canadian actor. He grew up splitting his time between Greece and Canada and at age 9 started doing TV commercials and professional theater. He left home at 18 to perform in a series of US national tours after which, he landed on Broadway. Diamantopoulos is best known for his supporting role in season nine of The Office and portraying Moe in the Farrelly Brothers' film The Three Stooges.
details.name: Chris Diamantopoulos
